entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 01:55 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Fog becoming fog patches late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:55 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 01:55 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
